website_summaries.verdict: Expensive hard hat with excellent safety ratings for heat, impact, and dielectric protection.
pros: Has adjustable sizes from 6.5 to 8 inches
Easy to adjust the size of the hat for the most comfortable fit
Covers a wide range of safety standards for several different types of industries
Full brim for maximum sun protection
cons: Some odd color variations from batch to batch

customer_reviews.title: one day early so that was cool. The quality of the hard was as expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the hard hat today, one day early so that was cool. The quality of the hard was as expected as I knew what was being ordered. On the downside the Fast-Trac III Ratchet Suspension system wasn't included so the hard hat is completely unusable. Don't know if that was a mistake or intentional. The description indicates it's included so without that I might as well use it as a bin for ice and beers. It's useless to me and now I need to purchase the ratchet support system just so I can wear this thing. Very misleading by the seller. SHAME ON YOU!!! caveat emptor. If I get shipped the suspension system immediately, this review can be changed.
customer_reviews.author: George Feathers

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and glued back together.
customer_reviews.text: Brim is cracked all the way around, there is a crack started up past rivet points. A couple of the cracks have even been glued. How is this acceptable to any standard?
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Suspension system and hardhat
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable suspension system that was provided with the hard hat does not work with the carborn fiber hardhat I ordered. Is there another option?
customer_reviews.author: Evan McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete...
customer_reviews.text: Hard hat received without suspension gear and therefore incomplete and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Missing items from order
customer_reviews.text: Head gear was not included in package as the description of product said it would be. Hard has useless with out head gear
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This thing always makes a statement..
customer_reviews.text: You already know this hardhat is worn by the most bad ass dude on the site so go ahead and join the ranks! I had to have one now that a standard issue one I wear is craking. Full fiberglass with some irregularities in the resin and coloring but only cosmetic. metal fasteners not plastic and comes with the harness thing. I got a chin strap so when the high winds want to take it away that wont happen! 100% awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ortega

customer_reviews.title: RW and ML??
customer_reviews.text: I love the hard hat, I'm just wondering why there is a RW and a ML written on the inside of the hard hat???
customer_reviews.author: Henry Diaz

customer_reviews.title: The Best Full Brim Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned numerous hard hats over the years, most company provided. This is by far, the most comfortable and presentable. Some full brim hats sit high on your head but this one equipped with the Fas-Trac Suspension fits just right. It’s a little pricey, but well worth the investment. I chose the white version versus natural because I work around heavy equipment and it stands out better and stays cooler in the sun. Some reviewers mentioned a person’s initials written on the inside of the hard hat. It does indeed come with initials, but they are part of the QC process at MSA.
customer_reviews.author: No One

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the old noggin safe.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this particular brand hardhat for many years and it continues to be a great choice for head protection. We wear them all day, and sometimes nights too :D . It fares well from use, and we have always had good long lasting use of them. Well, that is till it needs replaced due to age etc. The Amazon price point is superb, it saved us $$ off purchasing one locally. With a 1 day delivery too. If you like this model you can't go wrong with purchasing it here.
customer_reviews.author: Tom HightowerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: This is the hard hat to have. You may even like wearing it. It doesnt sit comically high on your head, its comfortable as heck and light weight, and it looks good too. Its an MSA product so you know it will protect you. The suspension is VERY comfortable. One caveat: this is micarta, it will likely crack if you have something fall on you. If that happens its done its job and you need a new hard hat.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler MooreTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it said it came with suspension came with shell only
customer_reviews.author: dave m

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great quality but do yourself a favor and order a large replacement headgear
customer_reviews.text: The hard hat is light weight and great quality. Highly satisfied the only thing I have to complain about is the headgear comes standard in medium size which suspends the hat to high on your head, I had to order a separate replacement head gear in large to keep it from falling off when bent over. Either had to take it off or ratchet it down so tight it would give me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Colby C

customer_reviews.title: The status symbol of hardhats !
customer_reviews.text: I am a superintendent for commercial contracting. Wearing a $100 hardhat has some humorous side effects. When vendors or other trades come on the jobsite they go straight to the guy wearing these helmets and ask "are you the super?" . If that's the effect you desire this is the hat for you. The quality, fit and finish all go without saying. If you are on the fence about the difference between a $10 helmet and a $100 helmet just ask yourself, what's your skull worth?
customer_reviews.author: Will Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great hard hat so much lighter and cooler than my old plastic great price compared to local supply house. Ive done trade work for almost 20 and always used cheapo plastic hard hats wish i would have spent the money years ago. Mine came with the suspension as well
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: on top of that it looks like a big bubble on top of your head and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap and is cut out uneven.on top of that it looks like a big bubble on top of your head and its very light brown not dark like the picture.i will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lightweight hardhat
customer_reviews.text: Premium hat, premium price, soso cosmetic quality control. First hat I got had a big run in the resin in a noticeable spot. Probably didn't affect integrity but for a price and as a gift, I needed better. Second hat had a much less noticeable dime sized color splotch and was a keeper. Still neither hat has cosmetically perfect. However both were functional and I would have kept either for my own use.
customer_reviews.author: John U

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and design
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in super solid feels a lot more solid compared to those cheaper $20 lids. The clips that hold the ratcheting system to the hat are metal which I like have had the plastic ones snap. The tan isn’t as dark as it looks in the photos but I like it still. Was worth the money for sure
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell C

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat
customer_reviews.text: I know of soneone who got hit with a 9 pound piece of concrete that came from approximately 7 stories above him; he got messed up, but this hard hat definitely saved his life and prevented some serious damage to him. On a brighter note, it’s comfortable, sterdy, and well made. No problems on my end. Would recommend if you wanna have a long career in the field
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gretter

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting.  Well made.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a commercial Plumber with over 30 years on the job. Just started his own company and this is now his favorite hard hat. Brim. Fit. Weight. Safety. For the man, or woman, who wants to stand out on the job in a good / serious way. If you want to be taken seriously ...maybe this is your hardhat.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon E.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Best hard hat on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Great hard hat and a great looking hard hat, way better than any of the plastic ones companies give you. I bought since because my neck was hurting and this significantly is lighter than my other hard hat and actually notice a difference in wearing this after a 12 hour day.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Porter

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt come with the suspension
customer_reviews.text: No way to wear a hard hat that doesn't have the suspension in it. Others had mentioned the same problem, but thought I would take a chance. Will just have to send it back and look elsewhere for one.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Buy this brain bucket
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second Skullgard,These are the most comfortable hard hats hands down. Either the full brim or the cap style you can’t go wrong. AMERICAN made AMERICAN quality
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with fast track suspension!!!! Now I need to buy separate ... $80 for hardhat with no suspension...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: brim cracking?
customer_reviews.text: with in a year, the brim is cracking. never been dropped, or abused. what is the time line warranty. i bought this from amazon, they have a great price. being in the trades, this can be a life saver. is this a yearly purchase? cant find the msa warranty, or if they have 1
customer_reviews.author: al p.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Was wanting a new hard hat and needed to upgrade from the standard white 3M jobber that everyone has. It came with zero issues and after breaking in headband it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Diehl

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd skullgard.  Good hats, first full brim
customer_reviews.text: Finish isn't automobile quality but it is a hard hat after all. Immediately noticed how much lighter and better the hat fit than my plastic full brim. Stands out from the sea of yellow and white home depot cheapies.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran P. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent skull bucket
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey until you realize it can save your life. I prefer the full brim and it is also rated for electrical protection. Also the most comfortable hardhat I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: wise1owl

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, you may not get the suspension even if you select it.
customer_reviews.text: The description said it came with the Fas-Trac Suspension but it was not included in the package. I even selected the try of suspension I wanted, I’m sure I didn’t pay over $100 for a hard hat with no suspension.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Would get again!
customer_reviews.text: Husband ordered this for the second time. Clearly good enough where he ordered twice! It also doesn’t have that spongy pad in the front where all the sweat soaks up in so he says that’s why he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Hard hat arrived today. It is very light and well made, but it did not come with the Fas-Trac Suspension. Without this part the hard hat is useless. I will be sending it back for a full refund it they do not ship me the lining.
customer_reviews.author: p.v.p

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat
customer_reviews.text: The hubbys favorit hard hat ever! He wears this sometimes for 12 straight and said it is by far the most comfortable he's had! It is extremely light weight as well
customer_reviews.author: otto hansen

customer_reviews.title: Look good and be safe, all in one!
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the cheap ones my company gave us. Not only do they look better, but they are built for safety, and it doesn’t hurt to look good while your being safe. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: hardcordell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged from MSA
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged and still in the manufacturers bag. It was packaged by amazon very well, so it is clearly a manufacturers defect from the factory. The gauge is so deep that you can feel the fibers. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Paup

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate, just get it.
customer_reviews.text: This hardhat fits like no other. Cant beat the price for what your getting. I'll never use anything else after using this hardhat for the last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid performing hard hat.
customer_reviews.text: Good hardhar that won’t be lost on the job site. You will see others with it on but not enough that someone can take it and wear it without sticking out. Comes with good headgear just add a terry cloth sweat band.
customer_reviews.author: David O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Is hard hat is a must for anyone who wants a quality hard hat that looks really awesome . The most comfortable hard hat I've ever owned. I will purchase another one as a backup
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I got headgear with mine!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I read review after review before ordering this hard hat and saw that almost everyone of them mentioned it not coming with the headgear so I ordered a separate fast trac headgear with mine. Well I got it today and I had 2 headgear in the box. Ha. go figure. I'm very pleased with the hard hat and the headgear it's very lightweight and comfortable. I guess I have an extra headgear in case one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Stylin
customer_reviews.text: Fits great looks great. Color darkens as it ages. I assume due to the sun. It looks good both when I got it and now after it’s darkened.
customer_reviews.author: trinity bay

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you don’t have to order 2 to get one.
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered was just the shell. I had to order another one to get the inside head gear.
customer_reviews.author: Terry O.

customer_reviews.title: MSA is always good
customer_reviews.text: Light hardhat, suspension upgrade is a little different than the old one but is acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Had to buy new guts! The ones that come with the hat sucks!!!
customer_reviews.author: johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome hard hat. I wear one just like this all the time. We purchased this one as a retirement gift and had all our employees sign fairwell regards on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Needs vents
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the wide rim. But wishes it had vents says he gets way more sweaty then when he wore a regular hard hat
customer_reviews.author: Kayder

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Great hat but you will probably want a better suspension for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used it for first job and seems to like to rude forward on my head. Surface scratches easily. It is comfortable as I wore it 12 hrs a day for 8 weeks, 84 hours a week.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Up

customer_reviews.title: Best hard hats out there
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best looking hat in the shipyard. It’s strong too. You’re going to want to buy different suspension though. The one it comes with is very basic and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Munn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for about 4 or 5 years now and bought a second one as a gift for my brother. He is just as impressed as I have been. Great product (you get what ya pay for)
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: NO SUSPENSION
customer_reviews.text: Hard hat is nice but came without the suspension, it states that it comes with it however me along with many others did not receive it! Extremely upset that I now have to buy the suspension that it was supposed to come with because the decided to not put it with the hard hat. And now I have no contact information to contact them. How upsetting!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Auyoung

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking hard hat. It’s comfortable lightweight and cool. This brim is a little smaller than the one on your standard issue cheaper hard hats. I wish it was a little bigger but it’s fine. Mine came with the Fas-Trac Suspension which works fine for me The finish on it is a little rough in some areas. The edge of the brim is a little jagged as well.
customer_reviews.author: Running Hippo

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: It’s very strong, lightweight, and it’s one of those pieces of gear that makes folks look at you like a professional. There was some discoloration in some areas, but I kind of like them now, they’re unique to mine. My only issue is how hot these make your head in the sun, but I saw this coming. Overall, it was a great purchase for my professional life.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift for my bro
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my brother who works construction he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my husband for his job and he said it is great. Not to heavy and not cheap at all! We had to buy a different suspension system for it because he did not like the one it came with which is why I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Blyzes

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed with the finish of the hat for what you ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with the finish of the hat for what you pay. Looks much better in the pictures but if you look closely the top much lighter and uneven. Obviously thats a bit petty but I expected better for the money. Otherwise it looks like a very good protective hat and thats what is important. Just be aware if you expect a nice even finish. I ultimately decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Turro

customer_reviews.title: returned and recieved a new one and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered was received with a resin buildup and crack in it. returned and recieved a new one and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: NDStutz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband, he is a heavy equipment operated for crushing concrete and he had a piece of concrete fly out and hit the hard hat and there was a small scratch on the hard hat and that was it. He said it really held up!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: ... year and a half old so might only be good for 2 and a half years
customer_reviews.text: A year and a half old so might only be good for 2 and a half years... Not that they check them but just fyi other than that im happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: daniel parrott

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and shiped perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had it a year now it still works great.will stand abuse and punishment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable. Anybody wearing a hard hat like us, 6-7 days a week 12-16 hour days, this is the hat to buy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The  Ferrari of hard hats
customer_reviews.text: Sits a little high. Other than that it’s the perfect hardhat light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Casey Karren

customer_reviews.title: Best hardhat I have used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hardhat because the company provided hardhat was not a good fit and left my head uncomfortable. I decided to purchase this MSA 475407 Skulgard Hard Hat and I absolutely love it. The weight of the hardhat is evenly distributed around my head and by the end of the day my head isn't aching.
customer_reviews.author: mamashank

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The hard hat was extremely light and comfortable. I highly recommend the Skullgard MSA hardware!
customer_reviews.author: Vegas702

customer_reviews.title: Beware, No where near what they’re describing, beware.
customer_reviews.text: No where near what I ordered or what was in the picture. If they think this is full brim, they need to get a different career. Do not order, it’s the biggest joke of a hard hat ever. What’s worse is, you order what you need for a job and they don’t even send you the right item.
customer_reviews.author: Christy johnson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased and it had an expired.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hard hat, seen it on the jobsite with others wearing it. Purchased it first week of November 2019 and was told today (January 2020) that the date printed on the brim shows its expired... What a waste of money. Wish I had known that and could have returned it back in November.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nishino

customer_reviews.title: Okay but didn’t have all pieces
customer_reviews.text: Hard hat arrived 1 day after if was supposed to be here and it did not arrive with the fas trac suspension
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Skull guard hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable hard hat I've ever worn . 10-12 hr comfortable haven't worn it longer than that but I'm sure it'll be just as comfortable ! I had always said I wouldn't spend that much on a hard hat should have a longtime ago no headache
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Came with NO suspension!
customer_reviews.text: What good is a hard hat when it’s just the shell. No suspension was included but shows it in description. Now, looking at the reviews, a ton of people are in my same boat. Will be returning Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: MSA makes good products
customer_reviews.text: Nice hard hat, light, maybe a bit warm since it isn’t vented, but use more often in cooler temps
customer_reviews.author: Craig F.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Since I received my hard hat I notice the first week I was using it that it was not complete on the inside it was missing like a washer that is suppose to holt the four clips and one was missing and I’ve been using it as is but I was warned at a job when are gear was inspected by new job orientation
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: After I bought it I found out multiple brands have the same thing for 1/3 the cost at stores around the shipyard I work at.
customer_reviews.author: kyle davis

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Much better fit than the baseball cap style. A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Paul Layton

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with Fast Trac Suspension
customer_reviews.text: I received it and it looks nice. But did not come with the Fast Trac as advertised and so I must give it a 2 star at most. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Team Siles

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this hard hat! He’s never complained & usually brags about it! (The selfie is the only picture I have of it)
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new hard hat in a pinch for work on Monday morning ordered Friday night had it by Sunday morning. Light weight, comfortable and perfect to my standards which are significantly high cause i work hard for my money...I recommend to anyone that is in the market for a new lightweight hard hat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Hardhat on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This hardhat is very light, almost forget your wearing it, or as if you only wearing a baseball cap, the Fas-Trac adjustable suspension is the way to go, perfect design, no hard edges, doesn't dig into your head. Very satisfied with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steven McCombs

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very sturdy material, comfortable head gear, and great product for the price. Con: Material gets really warm in sun due to it's color. (Tan absorbs sunlight rather than reflects like white does.)
customer_reviews.author: Heath Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat!!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby uses for work & loves it! He does hvac heating
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Item was as detailed. Felt about the same weight as the plastic one.

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed in the amount of flaws
customer_reviews.text: Hardhat arrived safely. A bit disappointed in the amount of flaws, foreign bodies, in the paint. I expected a smooth finish and found several bumps and other things in the paint. It's a work hardhat, but for the money, I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Kimbro 1214

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: You won't find a hardhat that is more durable, and also has unsurpassed lightweight comfort ! If you are required to have a hard hat on all day; it is worth the investment. -Very comfortable, carbon fiber is awesome, only kevlar can top this.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Guengerich

customer_reviews.title: 40 bucks cheaper tan the safety store...
customer_reviews.text: Great hat to retire my 10 year old one...yeah, they're more expensive than the plastic hat's, but by the time you buy two of them, this pays for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Roy B

customer_reviews.title: Cracked rim, not durability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for about 5months and the rim of the hard hat cracked, no satisfied with the durability especially for being a safety hat
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Surprised my Forman (Husband) with this and he loved it !!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Great Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Arrived on time. Have used it a few times and is very lite and comfortable. I would expect it to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hunkapiller

customer_reviews.title: Didnt get suspension
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive the Fas-Trac Suspension with the hat. I am hoping someone can send it out asap. This is a gift. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool hard hat, first fiberglass hat I bought! The liner is very comfortable too!! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The hard hat is very lightweight, but the durability suffers. I worked outside in the rain one day and the edges of the hard hat has begun to swell due to the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Must have for construction workers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hardhat. Light weight, strong and comfortable. Should have pulled the trigger years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: husband loved his new hard hat for work, great quality
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price-
customer_reviews.text: This was my second hat- kept other for 7 yrs- only updated due to being in compliance because of age.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: 2 tries but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one I ordered came without suspension. I Did a replacement order and returned it with no problems. The 2nd one delivered was correct. Good hat. Very lightweight my husband likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Solid hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. Very solid hard hat. Pay attention to the manufacturer recommended years of use. You will not regret getting this hard hat. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: missing key components
customer_reviews.text: Missing suspension it would be false advertising they refuse to send the suspension its listed to come with i would like to contact the company to find out how to get whats missing
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good hard had
customer_reviews.text: Love this hard hat. I’m basically writing this to tell everyone if you order a large liner separately the hat will sit much lower on your head. Worth the extra 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool BUT bought this as a gift for my Fiance's birthday and the inside straps and head piece broke after he dropped it once....hate to imagine what would happen if something actually hit his head.......
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son in law. He requested it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: hardbhat of production
customer_reviews.text: great fit and at our place it is a sign of safety and production foal met
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have patience
customer_reviews.text: For 50$ can’t really complain since theses cost 120$ got a steal for this then I got the large hard hat harness separate witch sits really low and nice
customer_reviews.author: pedro m.

customer_reviews.title: Being able to get my stuff in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Came written up with black marker. Had like a sticky feeling like if something spilled on it. Didn’t look good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jose m lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Took a minute to figure out how to snap the suspension in. Just had to use a bit more force. Not once it was in worked like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Melancon

customer_reviews.title: Fast-track suspension
customer_reviews.text: Was the hard hat supposed to come with the fas -trac suspension? It gave me the option to choose it but apparently doesnt come with it and now I cant even wear it 😑. The hard hat is awesome I just wish I could wear it. Can somebody contact me about the fas trac suspension? 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Oo82785

product_meta.title: MSA 475407 Natural Tan Skullgard Hard Hat with Fas-Trac Suspension
product_meta.description:
Color:Natural Tan| Size:Standard| Style:With Fas-Trac Suspension| Pattern Name:Hard HatHardhat Skullgard Natural Tan Ratchet Fas-Trac

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Skullgard Caps feature Heavy duty construction for use in steel mills and other heavy industries where elevated temperatures are common. These hardhats are extremely comfortable and easy to wear
feature_bullets: Skullgard helmets have been tested to radiant heat loads producing temperatures up to, but not exceeding, 350F.
ANSI/CSA Type I Compliant, Protects from vertical impacts and penetrations
ANSI/ISEA Z89.1-2014 (Class G) Compliant, provides dielectric protection up to 2,200 volts.
Equipped with Fast-Trac III ratchet-style suspension for easy fast size adjustment and all day comfort
